name: Bomb defuse minigame
author: Alucard648
info: Step on bomb before it blows up. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: No, it`s not typical "solve the puzzle within time limit" one :-)You have bombs with fuses. After some randomized time, one bomb, chosen at random lights it`s fuse, and Link must step on it before everything blows up. After succeful defusing, cycle repeats. Defuse bomb/s deveral times to win.
setup: 1.Set up 4 consecutive combos for bombs - unlit, lit, blown up (crater), then solved.2.Place bombs on screen, using 1st combo from step 1.3.Place FFC, where bomb defusal count info will be rendered. Assign 1st combo from step 1 to it. D0 - minimum delay between bomb fuse lighting, in frames. D1 - maximum delay between bomb fuse lighting, in frames. D2 - fuse time, in frames. D3 - damage caused by explosion, in 1/4ths of heart D4 - bomb explosion type, 0 - normal, 1- super , 2 - nuke (full screen flash). All bombs explode on challenge failure. D5 - number of bomb defusals to win.
